name: Piercing Mark
description: Expose an enemy's weaknesses to afflict them with Major Breach, reducing their Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5948 for 30 seconds.  You can detect marked enemies even if they use stealth or invisibility for 3 seconds. When a marked enemy dies, you heal for 4958.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You can only have one Piercing Mark active at a time.
effectLines: Ability has an increased duration, and you can see the target if they use stealth or invisibility.
coefDescription: Expose an enemy's weaknesses to afflict them with Major Breach, reducing their Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5948 for 30 seconds.  You can detect marked enemies even if they use stealth or invisibility for 3 seconds. When a marked enemy dies, you heal for $1.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You can only have one Piercing Mark active at a time.
rawDescription:
Expose an enemy's weaknesses to afflict them with Major Breach, reducing their Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by <<1>> for <<2>>.

You can detect marked enemies even if they use stealth or invisibility for <<3>>. When a marked enemy dies, you heal for <<4>>. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.

You can only have one <<5>> active at a time.
